text: Rico Escalona Puno is a Philippine technocrat who served as the undersecretary of the Department of Interior and Local Government between 2010 and 2012.http://www.pressreader.com/philippines/manila- times/20120916/281535108185655 ==References== Category:Living people Category:Kapampangan people Category:People from Tarlac Category:Benigno Aquino III Administration cabinet members Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Rico E. Puno
